reviews.review_msg: Good prof, but Im reading his courseware right now for another class, and I knew from crim 251 that he's a **** when it comes to picking hard readings, but He always made up with good teaching. Now, taking an online course with JUST HIS READINGS i have felt the extensive ****ness of his picks for readings...Good prof, horrible reading selection
I just sat in on this class be cause she is so great. forensic sicence.
Come on, this is the guy who wrote an entire book dedicated to the decriminalization of marijuana, he obviously rules.  Take biological explantions of crim behavior if avaialble.
